scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test && cd tests && vitest run
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test && cd tests && vitest run --coverage
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../client && npm run build && cp -r dist ../server
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m 'Deployment of the Back End for the Notes App' && git push origin main
